spec_data.Name: perl-XML-Simple
spec_data.Description:
The XML::Simple module provides a simple API layer on top of an
underlying XML parsing module (either XML::Parser or one of the SAX2
parser modules).
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 06:47:17 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Easy API to maintain XML in Perl
